vehicleComponents.name: ARTICO man-made leather /  microfibre DINAMICA AMG black
AMG SPEEDSHIFT TCT 9G
vehicleComponents.description: The AMG SPEEDSHIFT TCT 9G impresses sporty drivers with dynamic shift characteristics and the emotively appealing double-declutching function. Depending on the drive program it masters fast, sporty gear-changing or comfortable, barely noticeable shift operations. Its 9 gears ensure that the engine is particularly frequently in the ideal speed range.

vehicleComponents.name: Stowage facility package
vehicleComponents.description: The Stowage Space Package has numerous stowage and securing facilities for the vehicle interior and luggage compartment. Useful stowage spaces ensure that everything has its place. Large items of luggage and small objects alike can be secured perfectly in place and reliably remain where they belong.

SA-309.name: Double cup holder
SA-309.description: You have a refreshing or warming drink to hand at any time, even when on the move. This is made possible by the double cup holder in the front section of the centre console. You can safely deposit two bottles or mugs in it.

vehicleComponents.name: Galvanised steering-wheel gearshift paddles
vehicleComponents.description: The galvanised steering wheel gearshift paddles with their sporty high-class look and feel additionally enhance your interior. You can change gears with them without taking your hands off the steering wheel. In this way you retain full control at all times and not least are safer on the road.

vehicleComponents.name: Mercedes-AMG interior
vehicleComponents.description: The Mercedes-AMG interior of your CLS 53 4MATIC+ differs visibly from that of the series production models. Here you experience the special AMG feeling in every detail. Look forward to a sporty interior concept with characteristic highlights â€“ and a perfect fusion of dynamism and comfort.

SA-U26.name: AMG floor mats
SA-U26.description: The elegant, black floor mats with AMG lettering blend harmoniously into the interior design and effectively protect the footwells against soiling. When needed, you can very rapidly remove, vacuum or clean the AMG floor mats.

AU-671.name: ARTICO man-made leather /  microfibre DINAMICA AMG black

SA-L6J.name: AMG Performance steering wheel in nappa leather
SA-L6J.description: This AMG steering wheel is fully finished in fine nappa leather and perforated in the grip area. The hallmark AMG flattened shape has been adopted from motorsport and underlines the sportiness of the cockpit. Ergonomically positioned touch control panels ensure intuitive user-friendliness and are conducive to focused driving.

SA-873.name: Heated front seats
SA-873.description: Pleasant warmth that results in high seating and ride comfort. In cooler weather or as required, seat heating quickly brings the seat cushions and backrests up to a pleasant temperature. Three levels of intensity can be selected. Intelligent and convenient: the intensity of the seat heating is reduced automatically.

SA-U88.name: AMG steering wheel buttons
SA-U88.description: The AMG steering wheel buttons add an even more sporty look to your steering wheel: they allow fast, purposeful operation of specific driving dynamics functions. For a focused and concentrated driving sensation â€“ and for an authentic racing car atmosphere in the cockpit.

SA-H41.name: Light longitudinal-grain aluminium trim
SA-H41.description: The trim lends your vehicle interior an individual look. It blends in harmoniously while also creating exciting contrasts. As such it reinforces and underscores the interior design. At the same time, the trim is an enduring quality attribute of a meticulously crafted premium product.

vehicleComponents.name: Mercedes-AMG exterior
vehicleComponents.description: The Mercedes-AMG exterior of your CLS 53 4MATIC+ differs visibly from that of the series production models. Striking details such as the AMG-specific radiator grille, AMG light-alloy wheels and the design of the tailpipe trim elements characterise your vehicle. Fully variable all-wheel drive and AMG RIDE CONTROL+ bring the performance power to the road in an effortlessly superior manner.

SA-RRF.name: 48.3 cm (19-inch) AMG 5-twin-spoke light-alloy wheels
SA-RRF.description: 48.3 cm (19-inch) 5-twin-spoke light-alloy wheels&nbsp painted in black with a high-sheen finish, with 245/40 R 19 tyres on 8 J x 19 ET28 wheels (front) and 275/35 R 19 tyres on 9 J x 19 ET33 wheels (rear).

legalDescriptions.optionalNameDescription: painted in black with a high-sheen finish, with 245/40 R 19 tyres on 8 J x 19 ET33 wheels (front) and 275/35 R 19 tyres on 9 J x 19 ET28 wheels (rear)

SA-U47.name: AMG spoiler lip
SA-U47.description: The AMG spoiler lip painted in the vehicle colour is a bold statement of your pursuit of superior performance: this clearly visible aerodynamic feature reduces lift at the rear axle, thus supporting neutral handling characteristics at high speeds in particular.

SA-489.name: AMG RIDE CONTROL+
SA-489.description: The particularly sportily tuned AMG RIDE CONTROL+ suspension combines the advantages of several suspensions in one. The multi-chamber air suspension offers a very broad spread between the most comfortable and most sporty set-up and adapts to the given load. It delivers strong performance in every driving situation â€“ just as you wish.

vehicleComponents.name: Owner's Manual and service information - German
Active Lane Keeping Assist
vehicleComponents.description: If you cross a broken or continuous line unintentionally, the system can warn you by making the steering wheel vibrate. With a continuous line, or if the lane behind a broken line has been identified as occupied, the assistance system can intervene further with braking on one side of the vehicle.

legalDescriptions.footnote: Our driver assistance and safety systems are aids and do not relieve you of your responsibility as the driver. Please take note of the information in the Owner's Manual and the system limits which are described therein.

vehicleComponents.name: Active Brake Assist
vehicleComponents.description: Active Brake Assist can help you to avoid rear-end collisions with vehicles in front or stationary vehicles as well as accidents with moving pedestrians or cyclists. As part of this, in addition to distance and collision warning, the system primarily also offers situation-appropriate braking assistance â€“ right up to autonomous emergency braking.

legalDescriptions.footnote: Our driver assistance and safety systems are aids and do not relieve you of your responsibility as the driver. Please take note of the information in the Owner's Manual and the system limits which are described therein.

vehicleComponents.name: Knee airbag
vehicleComponents.description: The knee airbag protects your legs from contact with the steering column or the dashboard in a severe frontal crash. This can prevent or lessen the severity of injuries. The air cushion inflates in milliseconds and stabilises the whole body. This ensures that the entire restraint system including the seat belt work together optimally.

vehicleComponents.name: Double cup holder
vehicleComponents.description: You have a refreshing or warming drink to hand at any time, even when on the move. This is made possible by the double cup holder in the front section of the centre console. You can safely deposit two bottles or mugs in it.

vehicleComponents.name: Remote Services Plus
vehicleComponents.description: The Remote Services Package Plus turns mobility into a fresh experience and delivers greater convenience and safety. Status queries provide information about the operating range. You can control certain functions remotely and also locate your vehicle. For example, you can open your windows before you get in â€“ and thus ventilate the interior on hot days.

legalDescriptions.footnote: The components marked with * are Mercedes me services. A personal Mercedes me ID and agreement to the Terms of Use for the Mercedes me connect services are required to use these services. In addition, the vehicle must be paired with the corresponding user account. Upon expiry of the initial term, the services can be renewed for a fee, provided they are at that point still offered for the corresponding vehicle. Initial activation of the services is possible within 1 year of first registration or initial operation by the customer, whichever occurs first.

vehicleComponents.name: Mercedes-Benz emergency call system
vehicleComponents.description: The Mercedes-Benz emergency call system can save you vital moments in an emergency. If an accident is detected, a communication module with its own SIM card automatically triggers an emergency call which can shorten the time until the rescue services arrive. Alternatively, an emergency call can be triggered manually to organise assistance.

vehicleComponents.name: Extended MBUX functions
vehicleComponents.description: Create an emotional bond â€“ a vehicle becomes your vehicle. Because the extended MBUX functions can be fully attuned to you. Say "Hey Mercedes", and your MBUX system awaits your commands. Personal profiles, predictive functions and a WiFi hotspot completely redefine the term digital networking.

legalDescriptions.footnote: The components marked with * are Mercedes me services. A personal Mercedes me ID and agreement to the Terms of Use for the Mercedes me connect services are required to use these services. In addition, the vehicle must be paired with the corresponding user account. Upon expiry of the initial term, the services can be renewed for a fee, provided they are at that point still offered for the corresponding vehicle. Initial activation of the services is possible within 1 year of first registration or initial operation by the customer, whichever occurs first.

vehicleComponents.name: Communications module (LTE) for the use of Mercedes me connect services
vehicleComponents.description: The communication module with integrated LTE-compatible SIM card offers advantages in terms of convenience and safety. It keeps you continuously connected with your vehicle â€“ and links your vehicle in turn with infrastructure, such as the Mercedes-Benz server or the internet. As a result, you can make use of services such as Live Traffic Information from Mercedes me connect.

legalDescriptions.footnote: The components marked with * are Mercedes me services. A personal Mercedes me ID and agreement to the Terms of Use for the Mercedes me connect services are required to use these services. In addition, the vehicle must be paired with the corresponding user account. Upon expiry of the initial term, the services can be renewed for a fee, provided they are at that point still offered for the corresponding vehicle. Initial activation of the services is possible within 1 year of first registration or initial operation by the customer, whichever occurs first.

vehicleComponents.name: Hard-disc navigation
vehicleComponents.description: Save time thanks to fast hard disk navigation with flexible options for entries via touch control or voice input. The 3D displays of points of interest, for example, are also a visual delight. The intelligent system guides you reliably to your destination using both local and also up-to-date online information.

vehicleComponents.name: Preinstallation for Live Traffic Information
vehicleComponents.description: Arrive at your destination stress-free, via the best route and quicker. Live Traffic Information receives traffic information in real time which is more precise and up to date than conventional systems and optimises dynamic route guidance. Whether in rush hour or when travelling: You can react to many situations and easily avoid traffic jams and stop-and-go traffic.

legalDescriptions.optionalNameDescription: (service usable free of charge for 3 years from activation)
legalDescriptions.footnote: The components marked with * are Mercedes me services. A personal Mercedes me ID and agreement to the Terms of Use for the Mercedes me connect services are required to use these services. In addition, the vehicle must be paired with the corresponding user account. Upon expiry of the initial term, the services can be renewed for a fee, provided they are at that point still offered for the corresponding vehicle. Initial activation of the services is possible within 1 year of first registration or initial operation by the customer, whichever occurs first.

vehicleComponents.name: Touchpad without Controller
vehicleComponents.description: Using the touchpad, you can operate the display of the infotainment system as you would a smartphone. Shift or enlarge the content quite simply with single gestures. Each input is confirmed with haptic feedback. The touchpad recognises your handwriting should you wish to enter addresses or phone numbers.

vehicleComponents.name: Tyre pressure monitoring system
vehicleComponents.description: The system monitors the tyre pressure for you and provides you with a warning in the event of a drop in pressure. This way you can react more quickly to this hazardous situation. Too low a tyre pressure can also result in longer braking distances. When the control system notifies you, you should top up the air quickly. Correct tyre pressure additionally increases mileage.

legalDescriptions.footnote: Our driver assistance and safety systems are aids and do not relieve you of your responsibility as the driver. Please take note of the information in the Owner's Manual and the system limits which are described therein.

vehicleComponents.name: AMG RIDE CONTROL+
vehicleComponents.description: The particularly sportily tuned AMG RIDE CONTROL+ suspension combines the advantages of several suspensions in one. The multi-chamber air suspension offers a very broad spread between the most comfortable and most sporty set-up and adapts to the given load. It delivers strong performance in every driving situation â€“ just as you wish.

vehicleComponents.name: Speed Limit Assist
vehicleComponents.description: Speed Limit Assist makes it easier for you to observe speed restrictions by displaying speed limits for you. It can even make you aware of additional restriction signs. This information can help to ensure that you remain safe during everyday driving.

legalDescriptions.footnote: Our driver assistance and safety systems are aids and do not relieve you of your responsibility as the driver. Please take note of the information in the Owner's Manual and the system limits which are described therein.

vehicleComponents.name: Digital radio
vehicleComponents.description: Digital radio provides you with even more information and entertainment thanks to significantly more programmes. Select your own favourite station. At the same time, the clear, noise-free reception enhances listening pleasure.

vehicleComponents.name: THERMATIC automatic climate control
vehicleComponents.description: Individual climate comfort in the front seats comes courtesy of THERMATIC automatic climate control with two climate zones: the driver and front passenger can set the temperature separately for each side. They are kept at a constant level thanks to automatic climate control and a highly responsive sensor system â€“ completely without any need for manual adjustment.

vehicleComponents.name: LED High Performance headlamps
vehicleComponents.description: The LED High Performance headlamps provide more safety at night and an unmistakable, distinctive look. LED technology illuminates the road ahead better than conventional headlamps â€“ and uses less energy. The adaptive tail lights featuring LED technology adjust their light intensity to the ambient conditions.

vehicleComponents.name: Centre console in black piano-lacquer look
Wider wheel arch for AMG wheels
Heated front seats
vehicleComponents.description: Pleasant warmth that results in high seating and ride comfort. In cooler weather or as required, seat heating quickly brings the seat cushions and backrests up to a pleasant temperature. Three levels of intensity can be selected. Intelligent and convenient: the intensity of the seat heating is reduced automatically.

vehicleComponents.name: Ambient lighting
vehicleComponents.description: Showcase the interior according to your personal preferences or current mood. The 64 colours of the ambient lighting create exciting colour worlds, which can alternate dynamically or illuminate several areas in different colours.

vehicleComponents.name: Fuel tank with a capacity of 66 litres
vehicleComponents.description: With the larger fuel tank designed to hold 66 litres you will be visiting the filling station considerably less often. As such the fuel tank with increased capacity gives you an additional sense of freedom on long journeys in particular.

vehicleComponents.name: COC document EU6 with registration certificate part II
AMG DYNAMIC SELECT
vehicleComponents.description: With the AMG DYNAMIC SELECT drive programs, you have your own personal race engineer on board. Depending on the situation or your mood, you can intensify the sporty character of your vehicle. As part of this, in addition to the predefined set-ups there are also individually selectable combinations â€“ for example, a dynamic powertrain set-up with a comfortable steering feel.

vehicleComponents.name: Light longitudinal-grain aluminium trim
vehicleComponents.description: The trim lends your vehicle interior an individual look. It blends in harmoniously while also creating exciting contrasts. As such it reinforces and underscores the interior design. At the same time, the trim is an enduring quality attribute of a meticulously crafted premium product.

vehicleComponents.name: AMG Performance steering wheel in nappa leather
vehicleComponents.description: This AMG steering wheel is fully finished in fine nappa leather and perforated in the grip area. The hallmark AMG flattened shape has been adopted from motorsport and underlines the sportiness of the cockpit. Ergonomically positioned touch control panels ensure intuitive user-friendliness and are conducive to focused driving.

vehicleComponents.name: Summer tyres
vehicleComponents.description: Tyres with low rolling resistance have lower energy losses during tyre rotation and deformation. They therefore cut fuel consumption and reduce CO<sub>2</sub> emissions.

vehicleComponents.name: run-flat tyres
vehicleComponents.description: You can stay mobile even when you lose pressure in one or more tyres. Thanks to the reinforced side walls of your tyres, you can safely leave danger zones such as tunnels or motorways and drive to the nearest workshop. Depending on the load, it is possible to drive a distance of up to 80 kilometres at a maximum speed of 80 km/h.

vehicleComponents.name: 48.3 cm (19-inch) AMG 5-twin-spoke light-alloy wheels
vehicleComponents.description: 48.3 cm (19-inch) 5-twin-spoke light-alloy wheels&nbsp painted in black with a high-sheen finish, with 245/40 R 19 tyres on 8 J x 19 ET28 wheels (front) and 275/35 R 19 tyres on 9 J x 19 ET33 wheels (rear).

vehicleComponents.name: Status display for rear seat belts in instrument cluster
AMG floor mats

vehicleComponents.description: The AMG spoiler lip painted in the vehicle colour is a bold statement of your pursuit of superior performance: this clearly visible aerodynamic feature reduces lift at the rear axle, thus supporting neutral handling characteristics at high speeds in particular.

vehicleComponents.name: AMG steering wheel buttons
vehicleComponents.description: The AMG steering wheel buttons add an even more sporty look to your steering wheel: they allow fast, purposeful operation of specific driving dynamics functions. For a focused and concentrated driving sensation â€“ and for an authentic racing car atmosphere in the cockpit.
